channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: CCPD Peer Career Advisors to Host “Major Mixer” November 14
item.description: Join the CCPD’s Peer Career Advisors from 6pm to 8pm on Thursday, November 14 in the second-floor banquet hall in Russell Sage Dining Hall for a night of mingling and mixing with students across majors at RPI! Students will discuss their majors, experiences at RPI, and careers while enjoying a casual night with free food.
item.author: Students

item.title: OIP to Hold Study Abroad Info Session November 11
item.description: Interested in study abroad? All undergraduate students are welcome to join Office of International Programs staff at 4:00PM on Monday, November 11 in the CBIS Bruggeman Conference Room to learn about education abroad program options, study abroad and the ARCH, application procedures and deadlines, and how to get started. Please contact Karen Dvorak if you have any questions.
item.author: Students

item.title: Engineering Ambassadors Recruitment Open as of October 7
item.description: Date: Monday, October 7, 2024 12:00 AM - Tue , November 12, 2024 12:00 AM - Attention, all freshmen and sophomores! Applications are now open for the Engineering Ambassadors, a group that works with local schools to promote STEM exploration and make engineering more accessible to a younger audience. A recruitment information session will be held from 6PM to 7PM on November 12 in JEC 3232 to allow interested students to learn more about the organization and meet current Ambassadors.
item.author: Students

item.title: Industry Evening with Lally School of Management to be Held November 13
item.description: Join the CCPD and the Lally School of Management from 5:30PM to 8:00PM on Wednesday, November 13 in the Russell Sage Banquet Hall for an evening of professional networking and recruiting conversation surrounding careers in the financial services, business, and management consulting industries. Register in Handshake today!
item.author: Students

item.title: Looking to Move into an Apartment?
item.description: Date: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 4:30 PM - 5:30 PM - All students are welcome to attend this session to learn about how to search for — and explore the considerations for selecting — an apartment, as well as get information on the resources that the Off-Campus Commons has to offer.
item.author: Students

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Offer Mechanical Engineering Review
item.description: Date: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Register to join Rensselaer at Work faculty as they cover Rensselaer’s online, project-based Master of Engineering program in Mechanical Engineering. Participants can expect to learn how professionals can develop their practice in core mechanical disciplines while being able to customize the program to fit their needs.
item.author: Students

item.title: Constellation Energy Virtual Info Session to be Held November 12
item.description: From 5:30PM to 6:30PM EST on Tuesday, November 12, Constellation will host an information session for Rensselaer undergraduate students to discuss their initiatives and commitment to sustainability, the evolving energy industry, and what a career path at Constellation would look like! There will also be time for Q&A, networking, and one-on-one chats to answer your questions and get to know you better.
item.author: Students

item.title: Virtual Info Session to Highlight Accelerated Engineering/Science + MBA Program
item.description: Date: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Are you interested in saving time and money by getting your MBA in an accelerated program? Register to attend this session to learn more about the new Accelerated Engineering/Science + MBA Program, which allows Rensselaer engineering and science undergraduates to complete their Bachelor’s degree within eight or fewer semesters.
item.author: Students

item.title: Administration Division: South MRC Parking Lot to Close November 13
item.description: All members of the campus community should note that, beginning Wednesday, November 13, 2024 and running through Saturday, March 15, 2025, the South MRC parking lot will be closed to support a construction project in the Polymer Center.
item.author: Community

item.title: Be a Part of the Veterans Day Remembrance Event!
item.description: Date: Monday, November 11, 2024 10:45 AM - 1:00 PM - All are welcome to join event host Air Force ROTC, Detachment 550, for a Veterans Day remembrance event at the Louis Rubin Memorial Approach to celebrate RPI veterans past and present. A reception, hosted by the Office of the Registrar, will follow at EMPAC’s Evelyn’s Cafe.
item.author: Community

item.title: TWed Talk, “Intro to Quantum Fourier Transform on the RPI Quantum One,” Scheduled for November 13
item.description: All are welcome to attend this special TWed Talk as guest speaker Dr. Thomas R. Morgan, Senior Scientist with the Future of Computing Institute (FOCI) at Rensselaer, leads a very applied introduction to quantum computing as he discusses the use of the Qiskit toolkit and Jupyter Notebooks on the FOCI Cluster to evaluate Fourier Transforms using the RPI Quantum One.
item.author: Community

item.title: Event to Feature Lunch, Q&A Session with Speaker Dr. Fanny Elahi of Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai
item.description: Date: Thursday, November 14, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM - RSVP to attend this meet-and-greet lunch with Dr. Fanny Elahi from the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai! Following lunch, Dr. Elahi will present a talk titled “New Tools Mark a New Era in Neurodegenerative Disease Research” at 3:00PM in the CBIS Bruggeman Room.
item.author: Community

item.title: Physics, Applied Physics and Astronomy Colloquium Series Continues November 13
item.description: Date: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - This colloquium will feature a presentation by Frank van den Bosch of Yale University.
item.author: Community

item.title: Benelogic Service Outage Scheduled for November 17
item.description: Benelogic system maintenance has been scheduled to take place between midnight and 4:00AM ET on Sunday, November 17, and all portals will be offline during this time. After the maintenance is complete, users should be able to resume access and complete open enrollment, which ends on November 18, 2024. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Lizette Degro.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: TIAA to Offer Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling November 13
item.description: Date: Wednesday, November 13, 2024 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: “Creating a Mail Merge with Word for Windows” to be Topic of Fac/Staff Quick Learn Session
item.description: Date: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 10:30 AM - 11:00 AM - This session, which will focus on how to use data collected in Excel and combine it with a letter or label merge in Word, will also demonstrate how the Mail Merge Wizard can assist with the step-by-step process. If you often need to send out mass mailings, this workshop could be for you, so be sure to register!
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: HelioCampus Training to Assist Faculty with Adding Questions to End-of-Term Evaluations
item.description:
Rensselaer’s end-of-term course evaluations for the Fall 2024 semester will open to students on November 25 and close on December 11, with reports available to instructors on January 3, 2025. Any instructors who wish to add questions to their courses prior to the course survey opening may do so until November 24; the Office of Undergraduate Education will be offering webinar training sessions on November 12 and 20 to those who need assistance adding their questions.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
